meanings.sent2: He often bemoans his long commute to work.
meanings.sent3: The cat bemoans the lack of tuna in its bowl.
meanings.sent4: The old tree bemoans the loss of its leaves in autumn.
meanings.sent5: The child bemoans the end of summer vacation.

meanings.sent1: They bemoan the slow service at the restaurant.
meanings.sent2: She bemoans the high prices at the store.
meanings.sent3: The student bemoans the early morning classes.
meanings.sent4: The dog bemoans the lack of attention from its owner.
meanings.sent5: He bemoans the constant noise from the construction site.
